author: rooneg
msg: 'svn ls' with no arguments doesn't make much sense...
(svn_cl__ls): error out if the user didn't give us any URLs to list.
(svn_cl__cmd_table): update the help for 'svn ls' to show that at least

author: rooneg
msg: (print_dirents): sort the filenames, so sussman will stop whining about
it ;-)  while i'm here, actually use the native_author variable in the
output, since we went to the trouble of translating it and all...

author: rooneg
msg: (print_dirents): make our output a little more readable by rearranging
things a bit, limiting some lengths, and rolling our own date format,
since svn_time_to_human_nts() is way longer than we want.
